To deal with an uncontrollable fire – We Need Fire Fighting Equipment.

Be it a commercial building where IT programmers develop software, a public place for relaxing and entertainment, or a residential society where people feel at home without any worry. There’s one necessity in all these places and that’s nothing but “Safety”. The safety of human lives, their properties, and natural resources is one of the most important things for humans to survive and live peacefully.

Apart from natural disasters, there are many man-made sources that can cause massive destruction and harm to human beings. One of such elements that can cause harm to humans is “fire”. And to deal with fire, there came into existence the “fire fighting equipment”. These tools help firefighters to handle a fire that can be controlled without letting it cause any damage.

Fire Fighting Equipment

The equipment specially designed to rescue people, properties, and natural resources from fire and to stop/control fire at the initial stage without letting it cause a huge amount of damage is known as “firefighting equipment”. Some of this equipment can only be used by highly trained professionals.

Types of fire fighting equipment

●    Portable Fire Fighting Equipment

These fire fighting tools are used to deal with small fires that are detected as soon as the fire ignites. It serves the purpose of prevention and protection from fire.

1.  Fire Blankets-

●    Fixed Fire Fighting Equipment

These firefighting systems are installed at places of higher risks or areas that are prone to catch fire easily. They are not movable and work only for the area where they are installed, for example, engine rooms. The two most commonly used fire fighting equipment in India under this category are:

1.  Fire Hydrants-

They are used to provide a large amount of water supply in emergencies. The firefighters plug the hose or pipe into the hydrant and open the valve to deal with the fire. Fire hydrants are connection points by which water can be thrown directly onto the fire or to fill fire engines.

2.  Automatic Sprinkler System-

It consists of a water supply via a pipe that is connected to a sprinkler head. Whenever a fire is detected, the sprinkler starts functioning by sprinkling high-pressure water on the fire. With technological advancements, this firefighting equipment can detect heat and sprinkle water in a room before it turns into fire.

●    Fire Fighting Apparatus

Along with the above-mentioned equipment, there are firefighting apparatus too that provide firefighting solutions. These apparatuses are customized vehicles designed to deal with different types of fire. Different types of equipment are installed on these vehicles. Fire engines, fire bikes, water tenders are some of the most used firefighting apparatus.

1.  Water Tenders-

These fire fighting vehicles can carry a large amount of water to the place of the incident. It also contains a pump that allows the drafting of water into the tender from a water source like a stream or lake. Usually, water tenders are designed to carry about 10,000 litres of water.

2.  Aerial Apparatus-

This apparatus helps in creating an escape way for the rescuers and an access way for the firefighters. It takes the firefighters to heightened locations and is majorly used by European and American firefighting departments.

Fire Fighting Equipment Market

The firefighting product industry is expanding rapidly on a global level. It is also estimated to grow with a CAGR of 8.8% between 2019-2025 globally. The reason behind its expansion is-

  • Rapid Urbanization.
  • Governments making firefighting equipment installation mandatory in buildings.
  • Increased demand for safety.

African countries seem to provide a great opportunity to exporters of fire fighting equipment from around the world as these countries are focusing on their development. The industry of fire fighting equipment in Ghana is establishing tie-ups with different MNCs for its growth.

Fire fighting equipment market in India

The market of fire fighting equipment in India is also seeing major growth currently. With rapid urbanization and development in sectors like healthcare, infrastructure, logistics, and retail, the sales of firefighting systems are accelerating. Manufacturers are now providing customized firefighting apparatus with hi-tech features to improve their product quality and stand out in the market.

AVS International Pvt. Ltd. -A Fire Fighting Solutions Company

With a motto to serve the country, AVS in association with BEML emerged out as a major supplier and manufacturer of safety products for mining, firefighting, and construction. It has provided firefighting equipment to the defence sector and is a leading manufacturer of fire fighting equipment in India. And not only in India, but AVS has also stepped into markets of different countries including ECOWAS and COMESA regions. It has also become one of the major exporters of fire fighting equipment in Ghana. Along with firefighting equipment of all sizes, it also offers products like mini water truck, multi fire truck, pumper truck, rescue fire truck, and water truck. The company always prefers quality raw material and keeps in mind the supply parameters for all firefighting tools. As a result of which, the company was able to set a benchmark of supplying 104 fire trucks in the market of Fire fighting equipment in Ghana.
